This directory contains the recaptcha python client.
It is covered by an MIT license, but no LICENSE file was provided with the original source.
More info:
http://pypi.python.org/pypi/recaptcha-client
http://code.google.com/p/recaptcha/

To regenerate the 'recaptcha' directory, run this. Initial export done at r112.
cd frontend/third_party/recaptcha
svn export http://recaptcha.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/recaptcha-plugins/python/recaptcha/client
